    • Constructor Detail

      • MySQLDataConnection

        public MySQLDataConnection(Properties properties)
                    throws SQLException,
                           RemoteException
        Creates connection to specified database.
        Parameters:
        properties - should contain db.url, db.schema, @Nullable db.user and @Nullable db.password.
        Throws:
        SQLException - when unable to connect to database specified in properties.
        RemoteException - when something went wrong in RMI.
        See Also:
        Properties

                              throws SQLException
        Selects vocabulary from database.
        Specified by:
        selectVocabulary in interface DataConnection
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier of vocabulary.
        isExplanatory - indicates whether the vocabulary is explanatory or translation.
        Returns:
        list of records with empty vocabulary. Empty list if there is no such vocabulary.

        SQLException

      • findAllLikeStr

        public List<Record> findAllLikeStr(String substr)
                            throws SQLException
        Selects all definitions from database where defined word is like substr.
        Specified by:
        findAllLikeStr in interface DataConnection
        Parameters:
        substr - substring to search.
        Returns:
        list of records; you can use Record.getVocabulary() to find out from which vocabulary each record.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • addRecord

        public int addRecord(int vocabularyID,
                     boolean type,
                     String word,
                     String definition)
              throws SQLException
        Creates new record in vocabulary.

        Behavior depends on dictionary type:

        • Translation

          Adds new record, if it doesn't exists, does nothing otherwise. The uniqueness of the record is determined by the combination of the word and definition. Adds new words word and/or definition if they do not yet exist.

        • Explanatory

          Adds new record, even if it already exists. Creates word if is does not yet exist.

        Specified by:
        addRecord in interface DataConnection
        Parameters:
        type - indicates whether the vocabulary is explanatory. Used to avoid additional access to the database.
        word - defined word.
        definition - explanation if vocabulary is explanatory, translation otherwise.
        Returns:
        1 if the record was added successfully, 0 otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • deleteRecord

        public int deleteRecord(int id,
                        boolean type)
                 throws SQLException
        Deletes record with specified id, if it exists, does nothing otherwise.
        Specified by:
        deleteRecord in interface DataConnection
        Parameters:
        type - indicates whether the vocabulary is explanatory. Used to avoid additional access to the database.
        Returns:
        1 if the record was deleted successfully, 0 if it doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        SQLException
